channel.title: doom 3 alpha
channel.description: I recently downloaded the doom 3 alpha and I was told i should delete the doomconfig.cfg file that was in its base folder but when I try to launch the alpha it is just a black screen that does not load up the menu, so im here wondering if any of you know how to fix this?

item.title: doom 3 alpha
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
DOOM can be downloaded for free and played on any device such as a smartphone, ipod or psp.

DOOM II is the same as DOOM.

DOOM 3, on the other hand, is only for computers or consoles, and takes up 100 times more space on your HDD.

Read full topic

item.title: doom 3 alpha
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
I agree, Doom 1 is better than Doom 3. But that could be due to the sentimental value Doom 1 has for me. And no, not Doom 2, it wasn’t nearly as good as 1 :hmph:

Oh, and then download the Aliens TC, fuckin’ epic.

item.title: doom 3 alpha
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
xalener:

Doom fucking 1.

Then 3.

I mean 3 IS a remake of 1 right? or was it a “what if” retelling of 2?

No. Doom 3 is NOT a remake. That would be like saying “Metal Gear Solid” is a remake of “Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake” because MGS rips off Metal Gear 2 in many areas (such as some story and gameplay elements.) Or calling Bioshock a System Shock 2 remake for the same reason.
A remake is an exact/near exact replication of the original, like Black Mesa or the “DOOM 3 CLASSIC” mod (or MGS: The Twin Snakes.)

Doom 3 uses the same “story” as DOOM 1 and that’s about it.

Read full topic

item.title: doom 3 alpha
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Or just get DOOM 1, turn down the music, get a graphics/lighting mod, and turn the lights all the way down so you can barely see shit.

Yeah, Doom 3 just isn’t what DOOM is. It’s a slow paced and shitty System Shock 2/Half-Life clone with a crap story and mediocre gameplay.
But the “DOOM 3 CLASSIC” mod makes it alllllllll worth it!
Hopefully doom 4 gets it right. Until then, it has no right to be spelled in all caps like DOOM 1 or DOOM 2.

Read full topic
